events.message: We have received your application for the Software Engineer role and will start the review process shortly.
Your application has been categorized under the Engineering team as a software developer candidate.
A recruiter specializing in engineering positions has been assigned to guide you through the next steps of the hiring process.
Your initial screening call was completed successfully discussing your experience and technical skills in software development.
We have scheduled your technical interview with our lead engineer to assess your coding and problem-solving abilities.
You successfully completed the technical interview, demonstrating strong programming skills and relevant engineering knowledge.
The HR interview has been scheduled to discuss your fit with company culture and further employment details.
You completed your HR interview where we covered your career goals and expectations from the role.
We are pleased to propose you an offer for the Software Engineer position. Please review the offer details sent to your email.
We appreciate your positive feedback regarding the offer and your eagerness to join our engineering team.
You have accepted the offer and we are excited to have you join our engineering team as a software engineer.
Your onboarding process has started with orientation sessions and access setup for all engineering systems.
The hiring process is now officially closed, and you are fully onboarded as an engineer at our company.
